description.narrative: The following objectives of the intervention are expected to be achieved in relation to the above-mentioned theory of change. The overall objective aims at contributing to the reinforcement of the governance, the transfer of responsibilities to local governments over fauna and forests sustainable management , the increase of revenues of disfavored rural populations (Men and Women) through the promotion of Cashew nut value chains and other forests non- ligneous products, adaptation measures to climate change, securing land resources access and capacity building for vulnerable people.Specific Objectives:• To improve the governance and the implementation of the decree transferring responsibilities over the fauna and forest resources from central state to local governments • To Reinforce the promotion of Cashew nut value chains and a Malian label on its products• To contribute to community adaptation, resilience and the increase in revenues and food security • To reinforce the capacities of rural development agents to deliver adequately their duties• To assure an adequate institutional, administrative, technical and financial management of the Programme. The following main expected results will be followed- up by Sida: • The sustainable management of natural resources fauna, forests has contributed to the widespread poverty reduction during past phases.• The created Institutional framework and the consultation organs are validated and functional• The Coordination, animation and harmonization structures for a more holistic vision for forest resources management are created and functional • Agriculture values chains are organized, generating employments and incomes for the most vulnerable and poor rural people• Increased fauna and forests governance system is applied according to the decree No: 2018-0079/P-RM of January 29, 2018 sharing responsibilities and resources between the central State and the local governments over the fauna and forests sustainable management and Law No: 2017-01 of April 11, 2017 on the new forests governance vision including climate change, gender and decentralization perspectives. The following main indicators have been taken from the log frame of the Programme document: • Sites for agriculture, livestock, and fisheries are developed and productive • The revenues of beneficiaries are increased• Increased livelihoods and food and nutritional security for the most vulnerable groups• The communication strategy of related tools is elaborated and applied • The gender equality strategy developed during the first Programme phase is implemented and reducing gender gaps.

GEDEFOR III /Value Chains is the subsequent Programme phase of GEDEFOR II, To inverse the trends of forests and fauna degradation in Mali, a new paradigm is necessary. The new forest management vision, which as planned in GEDEFOR III /Agriculture Value Chains will seek to adopt a more comprehensive approach that will no longer start with the forest, but with the "landscape" or an appropriate space for men and women consisting of many ecosystems, as well as farms, forests, pastures, and fisheries.
The overall objective aims to contribute to the reinforcement of the governance and the transfer of responsibilities to local governments over fauna and forests sustainable management, the increase of revenues of disfavored rural populations (Men and Women) through the promotion of Cashew nut value chains and other forests non-ligneous products, adaptation measures to climate change, securing land resources access and capacity building.

"GEDEFOR 3/Agriculture Value Chains" (GEDEFOR III / värdekedjor inom lantbruket) är den efterföljande programfasen av GEDEFOR II. För att motverka tendenserna ifråga om den snabba nedbrytningen av skogar och fauna i Mali, är det nödvändigt med ett nytt paradigm. Den nya skogsförvaltningsvisionen, som GEDEFOR III / värdekedjor kommer att anta inom lantbruket, ska sträva efter att anta en mer övergripande hållning som inte längre kommer att börja med skogen utan med landskapet och ett lämpligt livsutrymme för män och kvinnor som består av mångfaldiga ekosystem såväl gårdar, skogar, betesmarker och fiske.
Det övergripande målet syftar till att bidra till förstärkning av styrningen och överföringen av ansvarsområden till lokala myndigheter beträffande hållbar förvaltning av fauna och skog, ökning av försörjningsmöjligheterna för utsatta befolkningsgrupper på landsbygden (män och kvinnor) genom främjande av värdekedjor för cashewnötter och andra liknande produkter, anpassningsåtgärder till klimatförändringar, tillgång till markresurser och kapacitetsuppbyggnad.

tag.narrative: 13.3 - Förbättra utbildningen, medvetenheten och den mänskliga och institutionella kapaciteten vad gäller begränsning av klimatförändringarna, klimatanpassning, begränsning av klimatförändringarnas konsekvenser samt tidig varning.
13.3 - Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning.

15.2 - By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally.

15.2 - Till 2020 främja genomförandet av hållbart brukande av alla typer av skogar, stoppa avskogningen, återställa utarmade skogar och kraftigt öka nybeskogningen och återbeskogningen i hela världen.

2.4 - By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

2.4 - Senast 2030 uppnå hållbara system för livsmedelsproduktion samt införa motståndskraftiga jordbruksmetoder som ökar produktiviteten och produktionen, som bidrar till att upprätthålla ekosystemen, som stärker förmågan till anpassning till klimatförändringar, extrema väderförhållanden, torka, översvämning och andra katastrofer och som successivt förbättrar mark- och jordkvaliteten.
8.2 - Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.
8.2 - Uppnå högre ekonomisk produktivitet genom diversifiering, teknisk uppgradering och innovation, bland annat genom att fokusera på sektorer med högt förädlingsvärde och hög arbetsintensitet.

title.narrative: Agreement on GEDEFOR III /Agriculture Value Chains
Decision on contribution GEDEFOR 3 / Agriculture Value Chains

description.narrative: The following specific results achieved: Recruitment or appointment of 117 agents while 44 others have not yet recruited or appointed Various terms of references developed for strategic activities A Steering Committee created as well as a Programme Follow- up Committee A total of 944,35 ha of cashew nuts planted in 3 districts by 940 producers among which 893 men and 47 women. The survival rate of seedlings is given only for one locality Kita where it is 72%.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
